name: Knight
message: Hey you! Im Sir Dorian, the knight of Lady Liana, she has summoned you

name: Sir Dorian
message: You must go with her, she is in the zone next to the gate

name: Sir Dorian
message: She will tell you what to do

name: Traveler
message: Why me? I dont even know her

name: Sir Dorian
message: She has chosen you, thats all what you need to know, you must go with her

name: Traveler
message: Ok, I will go with her

name: Sir Dorian
message: Good, now go... the guards will let you pass

name: Sir Dorian
message: Dont look at me, go to see lady Liana
